name: Aiolos Magic Cookies
description:
The god of wind Aiolos made some magic cookies for his wife, but the three headed dog Cerberus wants to eat them. Aiolos can control the clouds to cover the cookies and hide them from Cerberus.

Credits

Biting, Crunchy sound by InspectorJ@freesound.org under CC-BY 3.0, rain and thunder sound based on a clip from lennyboy@freesound.org under CC-0, start button from cooltext.com.
All other art was made by us during the 4th Klagenfurt Game Jam 2017
